def longest_palindrome(s):
    n = len(s)
    table = [[0 for x in range(n)] for y in range(n)]
    maxLength = 2
    i = 0
    while i < n:
        table[i][i] = True
        i = i + 1
    start = 0
    i = 0
    while i < n - 1:
        if s[i] == s[i + 1]:
            table[i][i + 1] = True
            start = i
            maxLength = 2
        i = i + 1
    k = 3
    while k <= n:
        i = 0
        while i < n - k + 1:
            j = i + k - 1
            if table[i + 1][j - 1] and s[i] == s[j]:
                table[i][j] = True
                if k > maxLength:
                    start = i
                    maxLength = k
            i = i + 1
        k = k + 1
    return s[start:start + maxLength]
